details.description_text: Deep Nourishment: Enriched with rice extract, rice oil, jojoba oil, and cocoa butter, this cream deeply moisturizes and repairs the skin. Anti-Aging Benefits: Contains vitamin E and gamma oryzanol, which help to protect the skin from aging and environmental damage. Quick Absorption: The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly into the skin, providing immediate hydration without leaving a residue. Natural Ingredients: Made with over 90% natural origin ingredients, ensuring a gentle and effective skincare experience. Certified organic and vegan-friendly. Mild Fragrance: Features a subtle, pleasant scent derived from natural ingredients, making it suitable for those sensitive to strong fragrances. 340690272.name: Vaseline Intensive Care, Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion, for Radiant, Glowing Skin, with Glycerin, Non-Sticky, Fast Absorbing, Daily Moisturizer for Dry, Rough Skin, For Men & Women - 400ml

details.description_text: BrandVaselineScentUnscented Item FormLotionActive IngredientsGlycerin and Vaseline JellyNet Quantity400.0 millilitreNumber of Items1Use forWhole BodySkin TypeAllSpecial IngredientsGlycerinMaterial Type FreeChemical FreeLIGHT AND NON-STICKY: The Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Body Lotion, with its special double-action formula is effortlessly absorbed into the skin. It makes an ideal dry skin moisturizer.HYDRATING SKIN MOISTURISER: This body lotion contains glycerine and oat extracts that hydrate the skin quickly while also nourishing and maintaining the skin barrier. The Vaseline Jelly replenishes and locks in the moisture of the skin, leaving it soft and healthy, making it a perfect skin lotion.SUITABLE FOR ROUGH AND DRY SKIN: This unisex moisturising lotion is suitable for normal, dry and even rough skin. It is also designed to withstand harsh climatic conditions and is therefore ideal for daily use.DEEP MOISTURE AND NOURISHMENT: The clinically tested body lotion for women and men can penetrate 5 layers deep into the epidermis and provide moisture for up to 48 hours. It absorbs quickly, so you can get dressed within minutes of application.EASY TO USE PACKAGING: The Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion (400 ml) has a smart pump quick-lock technology that unlocks and locks with ease without creating any mess, making it super convenient to use.HOW TO USE: For optimum results, it is recommended to use the Vaseline Deep Moisture Body Lotion twice a day, apply the Vaseline Lotion generously on the skin, and massage till it gets absorbed.

details.description_text: YC Whitening Diamond Lotion is designed to enhance skin brightness, providing deep moisturization while helping to reduce the appearance of dark spots and uneven skin tone. It contains a unique combination of brightening agents and diamond powder to gently exfoliate and reveal a more radiant, even-toned complexion. Key Benefits: Skin Whitening: Aids in lightening dark spots, pigmentation, and blemishes, giving your skin a brighter and more even tone over time. Exfoliating Properties: The diamond powder gently exfoliates the skin, removing dead skin cells to reveal smoother, glowing skin. Deep Hydration: Nourishes and moisturizes the skin, preventing dryness and keeping it soft and supple. Improves Skin Texture: Regular use can enhance skin smoothness and reduce roughness. Aloe suppresses bacterial activity, eliminates pathogenic manifestations and stimulates tissue regeneration. details.description_text: The Key to Radiant, Even-Toned SkinThe Whitening Body Lotion with Glycolic Acid is a multi-functional skincare product designed to improve the appearance of skin discoloration, correct hyperpigmentation, and keep your skin in good condition.Active ingredients :Alpha Arbutin Glycolic acid & Vitamin C Volume: 150ml/5.07 fl ozBenefit1.Helps exfoliate the dead epidermis. 2.Lighten and brighten the skin. 3.Protection against Oxidative Stress. 4.Slows Down Photoaging. 5.Fragrance-FreeIt contains Glycolic Acid, which exfoliates dead .skin cells, allowing better absorption of its whitening ingredients, including Alpha Arbutin and Vitamin C. The stable form of Vitamin C also protects the skin from oxidative stress and slows down the aging caused by sun exposure.HOW TO USE: Apply daily on cleansed skin or as directed by a dermatologist.

details.description_text: Products type : Body lotion Capacity : 400 ml Used for male/female Suitable for all types of skin Deep hydration: The lotion contains a blend of nourishing ingredients like cocoa butter, vitamin E, and glycerin that work together to provide intense hydration and keep the skin feeling soft and supple. Long-lasting moisture: The lotion provides up to 24 hours of moisture, helping to prevent dryness and flakiness and leaving the skin feeling smooth and hydrated all day long. Fast-absorbing formula: The lightweight, non-greasy formula of the lotion absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any residue behind, making it ideal for daily use. Skin-nourishing properties: The lotion contains cocoa butter, which is a natural emollient that helps to soften and soothe the skin, and vitamin E, which is a powerful antioxidant that helps to protect the skin from environmental damage. Improves skin texture: With regular use, Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Glow Body Lotion helps to improve the skin's elasticity and overall texture, leaving it looking and feeling healthy and radiant. Suitable for all skin types: The lotion is gentle and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Made in Indian

518801936.name: Vaseline Deep Moisture 48 HR Serum In Lotion For Dry Skin Body For Men & Women - 400ml (Indian)

details.description_text: Introducing the Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion in a generous 600ml bottle, a luxurious blend designed to replenish dry and rough skin with unparalleled comfort and hydration. Crafted with care, this ultra-light lotion is a true skincare staple suitable for both men and women, seamlessly integrating into your daily skincare routine.Enriched with a potent double-action formula featuring glycerine and Vaseline jelly, this moisturizer works tirelessly to restore your skin's lost moisture, leaving it velvety soft and supple. Its deep moisturizing properties and fast-absorbing formula shield your skin from the harsh elements of changing seasons, ensuring it remains radiant and timeless throughout the day.Experience the top benefits of this nourishing lotion, including 48 hours of continuous moisture, relief for dry and rough skin, a non-greasy feel, and its ability to penetrate all five layers of the epidermis. Formulated without harmful chemicals and free from any overpowering scents, it provides a truly indulgent skincare experience.Key ingredients like glycerin, Vaseline jelly, oats extract, and hyaluronic acid work synergistically to deliver optimal results, leaving your skin feeling rejuvenated and revitalized with every use.For best results, incorporate this lotion into your daily regimen by applying it generously and massaging until fully absorbed. Vaseline, with its rich heritage dating back to 1870, remains committed to promoting skin health for people of all skin types and backgrounds. With Vaseline, you can embrace life without constraints, confident in your skin's health and vitality.Made in Indian

Directions:Gently apply lotion all over the body. Best used after bathing when your skin is most receptive to hydration.Caution:For external use only.Please do not use if you have skin abnormalities such as injury, lump, eczema, or rash.Please carefully observe if there is any abnormality on your skin.If abnormality such as redness, swelling, itching, discolouration(white spot), or darkening occurs, please discontinue use and consult a dermatologist.Avoid contact with eyes. details.description_text: Product type: BODY LOTIONCapacity: 500 mlUsed for male/femaleSuitable for all skin typesThis lotion is non-greasy and completely effective in keeping you fragrant and fresh all dayMakes your skin feel soft and smooth, for all skin typesFrench inspired fragrancesmade in MalaysiaImported from UAEEnchanteur Romantic Satin Smooth Body Lotion is a luxurious body lotion that is specially formulated to provide intense hydration and nourishment to the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and silky to the touch. Made in Malaysia and available in Bangladesh, this body lotion is part of the Enchanteur Romantic range, which is designed to evoke the feeling of romance and femininity. Shea Butter is known for its moisturizing properties, and it helps to soothe and hydrate the skin, while Argan Oil is rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids, which help to protect and nourish the skin. Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that helps to protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals and environmental stressors. Enchanteur Romantic Satin Smooth Body Lotion has a luxurious texture that glides smoothly on the skin, leaving it feeling soft and silky to the touch. It is quickly absorbed into the skin, leaving no greasy residue, and it provides long-lasting hydration that keeps the skin moisturized throughout the day. This body lotion has a delicate and romantic fragrance that combines the scents of Bulgarian Rose, White Jasmine, and Vanilla, which create a beautiful and captivating aroma. The fragrance is designed to linger on the skin, leaving it smelling fresh and alluring. 504539543.name: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion with Shea Butter & Coconut Milk|For Soft, Glowing, Nourished Skin| Repairs Dry Skin| 100% Natural Moisturizers| All Skin Types| 300 ml

details.description_text: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion is a nourishing skincare solution enriched with the goodness of Coconut Milk and Shea Butter, designed to repair dry skin and promote glowing skin. Goodness of Coconut Milk and Shea Butter: This body lotion is enriched with Coconut Milk and Shea Butter, two natural ingredients renowned for their moisturizing and nourishing properties. Shea Butter helps to repair dry skin by providing intense hydration and restoring the skin's natural moisture barrier, while Coconut Milk contributes to naturally glowing and beautiful skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and radiant. Dry Skin Repair and Glowing Skin: Regular use of Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion helps to repair dry skin and achieve glowing skin. The combination of Coconut Milk and Shea Butter works synergistically to deeply moisturize and hydrate the skin, replenishing lost moisture and improving overall skin texture and tone. 100% Natural Moisturizers: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion is made from 100% natural moisturizers, which nourish the skin from within. These natural moisturizers penetrate deep into the skin's layers, providing long-lasting hydration and leaving the skin feeling soft, supple, and revitalized. Suitable for All Skin Types: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Its gentle yet effective formula ensures optimal hydration without greasiness or residue, making it ideal for daily use to maintain healthy, moisturized, and glowing skin. Incorporate it into your skincare routine for soft, smooth, and radiant-looking skin that lasts all day. No Harmful Chemicals: This product is free from harmful chemicals like silicones, parabens, and sulphates. Its gentle formula ensures that your skin receives pure, natural care without any potentially damaging ingredients. What is the benefit of Kojic collagen body lotion?Precious Skin Kojic Collagen Lotion is fortified with kojic acid and collagen to help lighten darken spots, age spots and blemishes. The light texture of the formulation enables it to absorb quickly into the skin, and it is non-greasy.Is Kojic body lotion good for face?Nasola Kojic Acid Lotion is a gentle, safe, and natural whitening lotion to lighten the face and skin and treat skin discoloration, age spots and uneven skin tone on your face or body. You can also use it as a skin lightening cream for intimate areas as well as armpit whitening.What are the ingredients in Kojic collagen body cream?Ingredients: Aqua, Mineral Oil, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol,Polysorbate 60, Stearic Acid, Phenoxethanol,Methylparaben,Perfume, Persea Gratissima oil, triethanolamine, Propylaparaben, Carbomer,Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Xanthan Gum, Kojic Dipalmitate, Butyler Glyzcol collages.Which body lotion is best for skin whitening?FAIR & WHITE-Miss White, Skin Brightening Body Lotion. тАжVaseline 3 Pk, Healthy White Skin Lightening Lotion. тАжNasola Kojic Acid Lotion Natural Skin Brightening. тАжKoji White Kojic Acid Skin Brightening Body Lotion. тАжLightenUp Skin Brightening Lotion.What is the side effect of Kojic lotion?Among them, contact dermatitis (especially on people with sensitive skin) is the main side effect of kojic acid. details.description_text: Product detailsFinding a gentle and effective moisturizer for your face and body can often be a challenge, but with NIVEA Soft All-Purpose Moisturizing Cream, your skin can feel soft, supple and revitalized every day. NIVEA Soft is an all-purpose body cream providing 48-hour hydration with a refreshingly light formula that quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving you without that greasy feel. With an improved and vegan formula*, NIVEA Soft contains 95% naturally derived ingredients**, plus Vitamin E and Natural Jojoba Oil for lasting softness. Gentle enough for daily use on all skin types, this dry skin cream works effectively for the whole family, including those with sensitive skin. Use this body moisturizer for dry skin relief, or as a hand cream, foot cream or face cream for women and men. 522803042.name: Laikou hyaluronic acid sodium hand serum 50ml

details.description_text: The Laikou Hyaluronic Acid Sodium Hand Serum (50ml) is a hydrating and rejuvenating serum specially formulated for hands. It combines the moisturizing power of Hyaluronic Acid Sodium to deeply hydrate, improve skin elasticity, and repair dryness or rough texture, leaving hands soft and youthful-looking.Key Ingredients:Hyaluronic Acid Sodium:A humectant that draws moisture into the skin, providing long-lasting hydration. Improves skin elasticity and smoothness. Nourishing Extracts:Additional botanical or vitamin-based components may be included to nourish and soothe the skin. Benefits:Deep Hydration: Restores moisture to dry or cracked hands. Softens Skin: Leaves hands feeling smooth and supple. Anti-Aging: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and maintains skin elasticity. Fast Absorbing: Lightweight formula that doesn't leave a greasy residue. How to Use:Apply a small amount of the serum to clean, dry hands. Massage gently into the skin until fully absorbed. Reapply as needed, especially after washing hands or exposure to harsh conditions. Who It's For:Anyone dealing with dryness, roughness, or signs of aging on their hands. Ideal for frequent hand-washers or those exposed to drying conditions. details.description_text: EFFECTIVNESSThanks to carefully selected active ingredients, the Body Lotion improves the condition of the skin, reduces hyperpigmentation of various origins, evens out the color and smooths it.The product is easily spread on the skin and is quickly absorbed. After application, the skin is soft and moisturized.Alpha Arbutin inhibits excessive melanin production thereby reducing existing hyperpigmentation and protecting against the formation of new ones.Vitamin C revitalizes the skin, affects skin firmness, smoothness and evening out skin tone.Glycolic Acid peeling dead skin by which it facilitates the absorption of active ingredients.Aloe Vera Extract and Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract soothes the skin and moisturizes it.The multidirectional action of the lotion formula allows you to achieve faster results in improving the appearance and quality of the skin.EFFECTSтАв Softening and smoothing of the skinтАв Hydration of the skinтАв Lightening of hyperpigmentation and evening out skin tone

531240351.name: Sreyansh Healthcare Blueberry Body Cream- 300 gm

details.description_text: Sreyansh healthcaretm blue berry body cream is prepared with the refreshing extracts of blue berry and exfoliating granules which cleanse our skin cells by eliminating dead and dry skin impurities. It nourishes and provides moisture to your body by keeping it hydrated leaves your skin feeling nourished and moisturized. Skin is the first defense of the body therefore it is necessary to keep the skin bacteria free, hygienic and clean. Body scrub can play very important part in keeping the skin clean by removing unwanted dead cell from the body, improving the circulatory system so that impurities and toxins are removed regularly from the body. Just use the body scrub twice or thrice a week in summers or winters and feel refreshed. Take the blue berry cream in your palm along with few drops of water or dry and apply to vulnerable areas like underarms, elbows, knees and feet and rub gently in cyclic motion until the scales of skin comes out. Just see the complexion of your skin immediately after the use and feel refreshed and cleansed. Blue berry extracts are highly rich in anti-oxidative properties and tone the skin. Also helps in removal of dead skin. It also improves the circulation of the skin and reverses the signs of aging like wrinkles, dry skin and age spots etc walnut shell scrub particles - the hard nut products naturally soft skin. details.description_text: Sreyansh healthcaretm blue berry body cream is prepared with the refreshing extracts of blue berry and exfoliating granules which cleanse our skin cells by eliminating dead and dry skin impurities. It nourishes and provides moisture to your body by keeping it hydrated leaves your skin feeling nourished and moisturized. Skin is the first defense of the body therefore it is necessary to keep the skin bacteria free, hygienic and clean. Body scrub can play very important part in keeping the skin clean by removing unwanted dead cell from the body, improving the circulatory system so that impurities and toxins are removed regularly from the body. Just use the body scrub twice or thrice a week in summers or winters and feel refreshed. Take the blue berry cream in your palm along with few drops of water or dry and apply to vulnerable areas like underarms, elbows, knees and feet and rub gently in cyclic motion until the scales of skin comes out. Just see the complexion of your skin immediately after the use and feel refreshed and cleansed. Blue berry extracts are highly rich in anti-oxidative properties and tone the skin. Also helps in removal of dead skin. It also improves the circulation of the skin and reverses the signs of aging like wrinkles, dry skin and age spots etc walnut shell scrub particles - the hard nut products naturally soft skin. details.description_text: Specifications In The BoxSales Package1 Body Lotion Pack Of1 GeneralSales Package1 Body Lotion Model NameIntensive Care, Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Serum in Lotion, 400ml Quantity400 ml Ideal ForMen & Women FormLotion Application AreaBody Applied For (Face)Moisturization & Nourishment Applied For (Body)Softening & Smoothening Skin TypeAll Skin Types OrganicNo CompositionLotion Ideal UsageAll Day Maximum Shelf Life36 Months UV ProtectionYes Paraben FreeYes Dermatologist TestedYes Professional CareNo Container TypePump Dispenser InstructionInstruction refers to the detailed information about how something should be done or operated. Net Quantity400 ml About the ProductThe Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Serum In Lotion, 400ml is a nutrient-rich, ultra-light soothing lotion that provides dry and rough skin with vital comfort and hydration. This Vaseline moisturizer is suitable for both day and night skincare routines and is suitable for both men and women. This body lotion for dry skin is crafted with a double-action formula containing glycerine and Vaseline jelly that retrieves the skin's lost moisture. Our deep moisturising and fast-absorbing lotion protect the skin from damage and dryness caused by the harsh seasons, leaving it timeless and radiant throughout the day.TOP BENEFITS:Fast Moisture & Hydration for 48 HoursDry and Rough SkinNon Greasy5-Layer epidermis Penetration Chemical-free ScentlessKEY INGREDIENTS: Glycerin, Vaseline Jelly, Oats Extract, Hyaluronic Acid.About VaselineWe believe that good skin health is essential for overall health. And we at HUL are on a mission to provide everyone, everywhere with the skin care they require. Our skin follows us wherever we go and moves with us throughout our lives. It is the only one we have. That is why Vaseline is dedicated to understanding and supporting skin health for people of all skin types and walks of life. So you can live without constraints. 336141817.name: The Face Shop Rich Hand & Foot Total Treatment

details.description_text: тАв The Face Shop Rich Hand & Foot Total TreatmentтАв 110 ml volume for long-lasting useтАв Made in Korea for high qualityтАв Ideal for hand and foot careтАв Moisturizes and nourishes dry skinтАв Can be stored in a dry and cool placeThe Face Shop Rich Hand & Foot Total Treatment Product Details - Multi-purpose balm with a thick creamy texture for the care of the skin of hands and feet. Effectively softens the skin of the legs, relieving the effects of long walking - dryness and corns. It makes the skin of the hands smooth and incredibly delicate, eliminating peeling and a network of small wrinkles. Protects from the negative influence of external factors.The main effect of the universal balm for the skin of hands and feet -recoverysoftening and moisturizingdeep nutritionVolume - 110gMode of application -Apply a small amount of cream to the skin and rub in with massage movements. Leave until completely absorbed. To get rid of corns, use the balm as a mask. For best absorption and impact, wear cosmetic socks on top.Active substances -Sunflower oil. Moisturizes the skin, compensates for the lack of vitamin E in the tissues, has powerful antioxidant properties.Urea. Softens and moisturizes the skin , prevents its further dehydration, promotes the healing of small cracks and abrasions.Shea Butter. Softens the skin, smoothes the network of fine wrinkles, gives elasticity, evens out tone, accelerates metabolic processes.

details.description_text: Product Type: Milk Honey Hand Mask Whitening Moisturizing Repair Exfoliating Calluses Hand Wax Brand: LAIKOU Use: Hand Form: Cream NET WT: 120g Feature: Whitening, Moisturizing, Nourishing Ingredient: honey Girlez Description Milk Honey Hand Wax Moisturizing And Moisturizing Hand Mask Hand Cream Features: Detergents and chemicals you every day make your hands dry and rough Get ready for smooth hands in just minutes with this Nourishing Honey Hand Wax Mask for dry and cracked skin, which gives instant whitening up to 3 shades while getting of hangnails, calluses, wrinkles, flaking, dullness and more. The unique all-natural combines nutrient-rich honey and soothing milk to revitalize dry and sensitive skin, giving you an instant moisturizing, brightening and anti-wrinkle gentle exfoliating. in Hyaluronic to help promote nutrient absorption, the hand mask is in soft and delicate texture. Simply apply a thin layer, the nutrients will quickly penetrate to your skin. peeling off, it leaves a fresh dewy look with boosted skin elasticity and firmness. Efficacy:Clean the skin of the hand to help improve the skin dry, rough, nourish moist, moisturizing water, skin moist and tender. Product Description: Instant whitening up to 3 shades, revealing of skin Soothes, softens and revitalizes dry and sensitive skin Deep water replenishmentt and nourishment with gentle exfoliation Relives hangnails, calluses, wrinkles, flaking, dullness, etc. All-natural: Honey and Milk Anti-wrinkle, anti-aging oxidation properties Hyaluronic to facilitate nutrient penetration and absorption Reduces dry lines formation and appearance Promotes skin regeneration and rejuvenation Safe and hypoallergenic: No Triclosan, Paraben, Benzophenone, Sulfate, and Artificial Pigment Combats saggy and rough skin Usage: Wash your hands with warm water and dry with a towel. Apply proper amount of hand mask evenly to your hands with thickness about 1mm 20-30 minutes, peel off the hand mask and wash hands with warm water. Apply moisturizer to your hands for better removal of the mask. You will see results of soft hands with silky satisfaction. Specification: Main Ingredients: Honey, Milk, Hyaluronic, Exfoliating Net Content: 120g Package includes: 1pc x Nourishing Honey Hand Wax

444478276.name: International Product NIVEA Soft All-Purpose Moisturizing Cream, Face, Hand and Body Cream, 100 mL

details.description_text: Finding a gentle and effective moisturizer for your face and body can often be a challenge, but with NIVEA Soft All-Purpose Moisturizing Cream, your skin can feel soft, supple and revitalized every day. NIVEA Soft is an all-purpose body cream providing 48-hour hydration with a refreshingly light formula that quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving you without that greasy feel. With an improved and vegan formula*, NIVEA Soft contains 95% naturally derived ingredients**, plus Vitamin E and Natural Jojoba Oil for lasting softness. Gentle enough for daily use on all skin types, this dry skin cream works effectively for the whole family, including those with sensitive skin. Use this body moisturizer for dry skin relief, or as a hand cream, foot cream or face cream for women and men. NIVEA is proud to be one of the leading companies in the field of skin care products, with more than 130 years of expertise. *no animal-derived ingredients **now with ingredients from nature retaining +50% of their natural state48-HOUR HYDRATION: NIVEA Soft is a lightweight dry skin moisturizer that provides effective and refreshing 48-hour hydration for all skin types NON GREASY FORMULA: This non greasy body cream for dry skin is an oil-in-water emulsion that absorbs quickly into the skin IMPROVED AND VEGAN FORMULA*: Contains 95% naturally derived ingredients** and enriched with Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E for lasting softness SOFT, SUPPLE SKIN: The NIVEA body cream is a gentle and effective daily moisturizer that results in soft, revitalized skin, every day FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: The dry skin moisturizer is gentle enough for all skin types, including sensitive skin and dry skin GREAT FOR FACE, BODY AND HANDS: Apply this lightweight moisturizer daily as part of your skin care routine тАФ as a face cream, hand cream or foot cream INCLUDES: One 300 ml jar of NIVEA Soft, All-Purpose Moisturizing Cream for Face, Body and Hands

BOOTS VITAMIN C BRIGHTENING HAND AND NAIL SERUM 85MLbrighter skin within 7 days* moisturises for nourished hands and nailsWe've lovingly formulated Boots vitamin C brightening hand and nail serum with 2x vitamin C** and YUZU extract. details.description_text: Fragrance and dye free; Safe for Sensitive Skin Light-weight, non-greasy, and fast-absorbing Noticeably smoother hands after just one use Specifically made for hands, helps repair dry skin and provide the moisture skin craves Products Collected from USA Made in Mexico Eucerin Advanced Repair Hand Cream 78gEucerin Advanced Repair Hand Cream is a unique formula specifically made for hands, helps repair dry skin and provide the moisture skin craves. Frequent washing and external factors like the environment can strip hands of vital elements needed to keep hands soft, smooth and hydrated. Advanced Repair Hand CreamтАЩs formula combines Ceramide-3 and Natural Moisturizing Factors. Ceramides help to strengthen the skinтАЩs moisture barrier to lock in moisture. Natural Moisturizing Factors, amino acids that are naturally found in the skin, boost moisture and prevent dryness from reoccurring. This hand lotion leaves hands noticeably softer and smoother after just one application. It is a lightweight and fast-absorbing formula that is gentle enough for sensitive skin. To Use: For noticeably smoother hands, apply to hands daily, especially after washing. Like Eucerin Advance Repair Hand Lotion? Check out EucerinтАЩs entire product range for a complete skin care regimen. Give your skin the dermatological care it needs!

details.description_text: DOVE LOTION, ALL-IN-ONE SKIN CREAM: Dove's lightweight face and body cream with a luxurious fragrance absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue, just touchable smooth skin that feels as beautiful as it looks.тАв COMPLETE SKIN CARE: Morning and night, simplify your beauty routine with a deeply hydrating face and body lotion that eliminates the need for multiple products.тАв HYDRATE & NOURISH YOUR SKIN: Dove Beauty Lotion is enriched with Nutrition, natural skin nutrients and essential oils that lock in hydration while nourishing the skin's deeper layers.тАв TRAVEL-SIZE LOTION: With a TSA-approved jar of face and body cream tucked into your purse, gym bag, backpack, or suitcase, no matter where life takes you, your skin can look and feel flawless.тАв DOVE IS PETA-APPROVED: Since the mid-1980s Dove has used cruelty-free, non-animal methods to ensure the safety of all Dove skin care products.

details.description_text: Product details of Shwe Pyi Nann Natural Whitening Thanakha Combo Pack(Myanmar)Shwe Pyi Nann Natural Whitening Thanakha -140g Face PackтАв Suitable for Normal SkinтАв Helps with Dark Spots & HyperpigmentationтАв Reduces Fine Lines & WrinklesтАв Controls OilinessтАв 140g pack for long-lasting use Shwe Pyi Nann Natural Whitening Thanakha is a 140g face pack suitable for normal skin types. This product is designed to address common skin concerns such as dark spots, hyperpigmentation, fine lines, wrinkles, and oiliness. The natural ingredients in this face pack help to whiten and brighten the skin, leaving it looking radiant and refreshed. Simply apply a thin layer of the face pack to your face and leave it on for 15-20 minutes before rinsing off with warm water. This product is perfect for those looking for a natural solution to their skincare needs.Combo Contains... 1 Pics 140gm Thanaka Face Pack 1 pics 200ml Body Lotion . Made in Myanmer. 540899313.name: Vaseline Deep Moisture 48 HR Serum In Lotion For Dry Skin

details.description_text: Product DescriptionIntroducing the Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion in a generous 600ml bottle, a luxurious blend designed to replenish dry and rough skin with unparalleled comfort and hydration. Crafted with care, this ultra-light lotion is a true skincare staple suitable for both men and women, seamlessly integrating into your daily skincare routine.Enriched with a potent double-action formula featuring glycerine and Vaseline jelly, this moisturizer works tirelessly to restore your skin's lost moisture, leaving it velvety soft and supple. Its deep moisturizing properties and fast-absorbing formula shield your skin from the harsh elements of changing seasons, ensuring it remains radiant and timeless throughout the day.Experience the top benefits of this nourishing lotion, including 48 hours of continuous moisture, relief for dry and rough skin, a non-greasy feel, and its ability to penetrate all five layers of the epidermis. Formulated without harmful chemicals and free from any overpowering scents, it provides a truly indulgent skincare experience.Key ingredients like glycerin, Vaseline jelly, oats extract, and hyaluronic acid work synergistically to deliver optimal results, leaving your skin feeling rejuvenated and revitalized with every use.For best results, incorporate this lotion into your daily regimen by applying it generously and massaging until fully absorbed.
